text: Great hometown feeling.reasonable prices and friendly bartenders. A must stop kinda place.

Great local breakfast spot!  The white bread is awesome!  Possibly home made???  The bloody Mary's are wonderful with a lot of fixin's.  Always great service and fast turnaround.  The sausage patty we had was huge, I could not finish mine.
This place has amazing food and delicious bloody Mary's.  The people are great and service alone deserves 5 stars.   Love this place.
